metadata.title: CVE-2020-5210 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In NetHack before 3.6.5, an invalid argument to the -w command line optioncan cause a buffer overflow resulting in a crash or remote codeexecution/privilege escalation. This vulnerability affects systems thathave NetHack installed suid/sgid and shared systems that allow users toinfluence command line options. Users should upgrade to NetHack 3.6.5.

criterions.comment: nethack package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
